title: no compiled file output and there are no error warnings
body:
I tried this code: ```rust fn main() { println!("Hello, world!"); } ``` i run `rustc ./main.rs` ```shell ➜ hello_world $ rustc ./main.rs ➜ hello_world $ tree . └── main.rs 0 directories, 1 file ``` I expected to see this happen: Hope to compile the binary file main Instead, this happened: main binary file does not exist I try to create project with `cargo new` and execute `cargo build`, `cargo run` have similar problem; ```shell ➜ hello_cargo git:(master) ✗ $ cargo build Compiling hello_cargo v0.1.0 (/Users/veath/information/learn-rust/hello_cargo) Finished dev [unoptimized + debuginfo] target(s) in 0.40s hello_cargo git:(master) ✗ $ cargo run Compiling hello_cargo v0.1.0 (/Users/veath/information/learn-rust/hello_cargo) Finished dev [unoptimized + debuginfo] target(s) in 0.18s Running `target/debug/hello_cargo` error: could not execute process `target/debug/hello_cargo` (never executed) ``` `cargo build` The generated files are as follows ``` ➜ hello_cargo git:(master) ✗ $ tree . ├── Cargo.lock ├── Cargo.toml ├── src │ └── main.rs └── target ├── CACHEDIR.TAG └── debug ├── build ├── deps │ ├── hello_cargo-c3cb0b9ae7c833ec.258h9wdl14xl7amb.rcgu.o │ ├── hello_cargo-c3cb0b9ae7c833ec.2qhyslsfi5wbzwza.rcgu.o │ ├── hello_cargo-c3cb0b9ae7c833ec.47w2y71k488mjgbr.rcgu.o │ ├── hello_cargo-c3cb0b9ae7c833ec.4mesbwo6ksiok42g.rcgu.o │ ├── hello_cargo-c3cb0b9ae7c833ec.4tecnnvt7dtcg8cs.rcgu.o │ ├── hello_cargo-c3cb0b9ae7c833ec.d │ └── hello_cargo-c3cb0b9ae7c833ec.tjttwf6ygfuuxe3.rcgu.o ├── examples ├── hello_cargo.d └── incremental └── hello_cargo-2htqym032o1se ├── s-gjcr2b5a5a-3fzv5r-94tmpy2exchk │ ├── 258h9wdl14xl7amb.o │ ├── 2qhyslsfi5wbzwza.o │ ├── 47w2y71k488mjgbr.o │ ├── 4mesbwo6ksiok42g.o │ ├── 4tecnnvt7dtcg8cs.o │ ├── dep-graph.bin │ ├── query-cache.bin │ ├── tjttwf6ygfuuxe3.o │ └── work-products.bin └── s-gjcr2b5a5a-3fzv5r.lock 9 directories, 22 files ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: I tried version 1.68.0 and nightly version ``` rustc 1.68.0 (2c8cc3432 2023-03-06) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74 commit-date: 2023-03-06 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.68.0 LLVM version: 15.0.6 ``` ``` rustc 1.70.0-nightly (a266f1199 2023-03-22) binary: rustc commit-hash: a266f11990d9544ee408e213e1eec8cc9eb032b7 commit-date: 2023-03-22 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.70.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ```
Backtrace

``` ```
